biography.title: Biography
biography.content:
I am a Front-End developer enthusiastic about creating elegant and functional web applications. I have training in web development and am always looking for new challenges to never stop learning and growing professionally. I have experience with React, Next, Vue and Nuxt. Javascript/Typescript are my passion.

With over 14 years of experience in the tourism industry, particularly with the Amadeus GDS, and more than 5 years in front-end development, I have a broad vision to implement and add value to the development projects I am part of.

I invite you to view my projects in the "Projects" section or by clicking the button below. If you want to know more about me, you can contact me in the "Contact" section.

skills.title: Skills
items: HTML5/CSS3 and CSS frameworks like Tailwind

projects.title: Projects
projects.content: I have worked on several interesting projects, including e-commerce web applications, educational platforms, and business productivity tools. Each project has provided valuable knowledge and experiences that have helped me grow as a developer.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: You can contact me through my email: example@email.com or through my social media profiles. I am always open to new opportunities and interesting collaborations.

hero.title: Welcome to My Portfolio
hero.subtitle: I am a web developer specializing in modern web technologies.
hero.announcement: Announcing our next round of funding.
